name: The Wonderful World of Shittiphus
description:
Two Dung Beetles, trapped in an underground bunker in summer, must tweet their way out to attract attention, by the only way they know how.

Made for #KiwiJAM15 by these fullas:

Mike Blythe @dukidesign

Chris Lyne @stinkythebad

Phil James @shinestrength

2 Players.

Supports Two X-Box Controllers (only - sorry!)

or Keyboard:

Player 1: WSAD + Left Shift (Action Button)

Player 2: UHJK + Right Shift (Action Button)

You can (kind of) reset Players (1 + 2 on Keyboard - buggy as hell)

See other games from this jam here!
